title: Hybrid Platform Collaborative Learning for Facilitating Cross-Cultural Online Discussions

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Mobile-based learning in a smartphone-centric limited technology environment. Learners consist of students/job seekers with advanced expertise in science.

learning_goals: Learners can compare and analyze at least three scientific perspectives through cross-cultural online discussions.
Learners can effectively perform collaborative learning at least twice a week using blended platforms (formal/informal).
Learners can recognize and adjust linguistic and non-linguistic differences that arise during cross-cultural communication.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
